TopicTitle: Your First Rocket, Post your First ever Ship.

Articles.Content:
This is just a place to share your first ever crafts!

Anything goes!

Something similar to this. I don't have any screenshots of when I had 0.13, but I know that the spacecraft I did have, I used at least 50 times to land on the Mun.

Back when "landing gear" consisted of mounting tailfins to decouplers mounted as low as possible, so you wouldn't rest the engine bell directly on the surface.

http://fc01.deviantart.net/fs71/f/2012/200/2/3/ksp_1_by_panzerschreckleopard-d57v3iv.jpg

Something similar to this. I don't have any screenshots of when I had 0.13, but I know that the spacecraft I did have, I used at least 50 times to land on the Mun.

Back when "landing gear" consisted of mounting tailfins to decouplers mounted as low as possible, so you wouldn't rest the engine bell directly on the surface.

Now that takes me back...

I lost all of my old screenshots on my old computer. :P
I always crashed because i was a rook back then.
0.13.2, named "Auto Saved Ship" (screenshot taken today)
